definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: A must for the amateur anthropologist who seeks to guage the feromonic field.
sentences.chinese: 爲業餘人類學家在測量領域尋求軌跡而準備的物品。

sentences.english: From an anthropologist's perspective, Farai is not so sure.
sentences.chinese: 人類學家法萊的觀點卻沒有那麼肯定。

sentences.english: GRISSOM: Lady Heather, you're an anthropologist.
sentences.chinese: 希瑟女士，你真是一個人類學家。

sentences.english: Anthropologists have identified three major classes of human-like ape as living at that time.
sentences.chinese: 人類學家已經確認當時生活着三大綱類人猿。

sentences.english: I am an anthropologist, a costly trained anthropologist.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個人類學家，受過專業訓練。

sentences.english: Mr. Barrios is a historian, an anthropologist and investigator.
sentences.chinese: 巴利歐斯先生是一位歷史學家，人類學家和研究者。

sentences.english: As a forensic anthropologist, to review the ultimate cold case is a privilege.
sentences.chinese: 身爲法院的一名人類學家，我有查看過往懸案的特權。

sentences.english: An anthropologist wrote a treatise on some of these fables.
sentences.chinese: 一位人類學家寫了一部關於這些寓言的專着。

sentences.english: Lile an anthropologist wrote a treatise on some of these fables.
sentences.chinese: 如同一位人類學家寫了一部關於這些寓言的專著。

sentences.english: Anthropologists think of a good joke as a successful virus.
sentences.chinese: 人類學家認爲好的笑話就像一種成功的病毒。

sentences.english: Interpretation of Culture is the finest work of Clifford Geerz, a famous anthropologist in America.
sentences.chinese: 《文化的解釋》是美國著名人類學家克利福德。

sentences.english: Anthropologists know the Nubians were skilled brewers.
sentences.chinese: 人類學家們都知道努比亞人造啤酒的經驗豐富。

definition: Joseph Needham (1900-1995), British biochemist and author of Science and Civilization in China
Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter (Tw)
Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
